title: Kryptowerk
author: Kryptowerk
created_time: December 14, 2022, 01:47:07 AMLast edit: December 14, 2022, 02:25:34 AM by Kryptowerk
content: Austria Crypto Stamp First Day Cover BLUE STAMP-------------------------------------------------You can scan the QR code to verify it's one of the very rare blue stamp FDCs: https://cryptostamp.com/CS1/6n4vqtMore info on the Austrian crypto stamps: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5153959.0Item will be shipped in a bend- and water-protective parcel.STARTING BID: 0.005 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005 BTCEND TIME: DECEMBER 18th, 2022, 17:00:00 EST (New York Time)TIMER: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/summer?p0=37&iso=20221218T23- Payment due within 24 hours of auction end -SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin, some Altcoins on request (dm BEFORE bidding, otherwise only BTC)SHIPPING: within EU: $7, outside: $10NEW ACCOUNTS: newly created accounts (without positive trust for successful trades and without copper membership) are only allowed to bid if they sent a pm to me first and are willing to deposit a collateral (0.005 BTC) either directly to me or to a trusted escrow on this forum (MJ, Hhampuz, krogoth, Mopar etc.).I also reserve the right to exclude anyone from bidding if they got a bunch of negative trust.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: haloxon on December 14, 2022, 06:41:08 AM.005Thanks for kicking this auction off, haloxon!Just a few notes about this FDC:- FDCs were are much rarer than plain crypto stamps. It's estimated that less than 1/10th of CS 1.0 were created as FDCs. Of these FDCs, only 13% were issued with a blue stamp making this one a very rare item.- Because of the high demand of crypto stamps especially the CS1.0 was subject to forgery (after several months on the market).I am original purchaser of these stamps / FDCs and guarantee they are geniuine and the NFT + ETH are still intact and on the wallet of the stamp.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on December 16, 2022, 01:03:43 AMThanks for kicking this auction off, haloxon!Just a few notes about this FDC:- FDCs were are much rarer than plain crypto stamps. It's estimated that less than 1/10th of CS 1.0 were created as FDCs. Of these FDCs, only 13% were issued with a blue stamp making this one a very rare item.- Because of the high demand of crypto stamps especially the CS1.0 was subject to forgery (after several months on the market).I am original purchaser of these stamps / FDCs and guarantee they are geniuine and the NFT + ETH are still intact and on the wallet of the stamp.Yeah, I'm of the opinion this item is worth at least 200 USD, maybe more back when these first came out and everyone went apeshit over them on here, I'd have to dig back far lol  Add on the fact that ebay won't allow them now either, I don't know any other place but the crytostamp Telegram now to buy/sell these!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Auction ends tomorrow night!Quote from: haloxon on December 17, 2022, 10:39:52 PMQuote from: owlcatz on December 16, 2022, 01:11:34 AMAdd on the fact that ebay won't allow them now either, I don't know any other place but the crytostamp Telegram now to buy/sell these! it seems that there are still some ways to offer them on eBay    see the eBay-links on tg recently which are not deleted by eBayThanks for the tip, will check ebay out again, soon.Just generally I feel ebay is not the nicest experience out there.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: haloxon on December 14, 2022, 06:41:08 AM.005Winning bid, thank you haloxon. And congrats on the good catch, we are probably experiencing cryptostamp-winter right now. Will contact you via dm with details.
